dialogueText: The clouds in the sky seem stuck, unchanging, and the landscape around you is vibrant but static.
This is a very strange place. Strange, but strangely familiar. Have you been here before?
It feels as if you're about to hear singing... but the faint strains of song never come.
No song, but... wasn't there something else here?
Ah! There it is!
As you wander through the illogical dreamscapes Dracula has forced you into, you stumble across a scene you seem to recall from somewhere...
A picnic!
But this picnic seems abandoned...
The teacups, plates and sandwiches are scattered and the utensils are in disarray.
You notice that there are utensils enough for four people...
It seems to you that the last time you saw this scene, there were only enough for two.
As you look upon the scene, a face comes to mind.
A gentle, smiling face...
And a name...
Dorothy.
You search around, but there is no sign of the girl with the penchant for sandwiches in strange locales.
Instead, a growing sense of dread invades.
Something about the landscape feels wrong, like little tiny cracks are appearing in it, cracks that are too small to see, but are there nonetheless.
And there are other things here. Things that almost certainly weren't here before...
Dreamless!
노랫소리가 희미하게 이어진다.
숲속의 가느다란 오솔길, 머리 위의 뜬구름은 미동조차 없다.
꼭 그림을 잘라 붙여둔 것 같은 하늘...
원더랜드의 버섯 숲과 비슷하면서도 전혀 다른 장소.
평화로운 바람이 불고, 싱그러운 햇살이 쏟아지는 곳.
익숙하면서도 낯선 장소가 마음에 기시감을 불러일으킨다.
숲은 안으로 들어가면 들어갈수록 풀이나 나무가 잔잔해지더니
결국 탁 트인 공터에 도착했다.
고급스러운 테이블 위에 쏟아진 홍차 위로 아직 희뿌연 연기가 일렁인다.
만들다 만 샌드위치와 엎어진 피크닉 바구니, 터진 소스통...
테이블 아래 남은 새카만 발자국들이 불청객의 수를 연상하게 했다.
이 정도 규모의 드림리스라면 도미니언의 성 근처에서나 볼 수 있을 텐데.
꿈 ~ 꾸는 ~ 자 ~ ?
엉뚱하고 발랄한 목소리가 멀리서 나를 부른다.
오솔길의 끝, 앙증맞은 피크닉 바구니를 든 소녀가 손을 흔들고 있다.
어찌나 해맑게 흔드는지, 나도 모르게 함께 손을 흔들 정도였다.
잠깐, 저 얼굴은...!
어라~ 조심하는 게 좋아요~ 거기 뒤에~ 하며 도로시가 고개를 까딱인다.
과연, 그녀의 말대로 오솔길의 반대편 끝에 어두운 균열이 일렁이고 있다.
손바닥만 하던 어둠이 서서히 커지더니...
순식간에 드림리스가 쏟아져 나오기 시작했다.
The clouds in the sky seem stuck, unchanging, and the landscape around you is vibrant but static.
This is a very strange place. Strange, but strangely familiar. Have you been here before?
It feels as if you're about to hear singing... but the faint strains of song never come.
No song, but... wasn't there something else here?
Ah! There it is!
As you wander through the illogical dreamscapes Dracula has forced you into, you stumble across a scene you seem to recall from somewhere...
A picnic!
But this picnic seems abandoned...
The teacups, plates and sandwiches are scattered and the utensils are in disarray.
You notice that there are utensils enough for four people...
It seems to you that the last time you saw this scene, there were only enough for two.
As you look upon the scene, a face comes to mind.
A gentle, smiling face...
And a name...
Dorothy.
You search around, but there is no sign of the girl with the penchant for sandwiches in strange locales.
Instead, a growing sense of dread invades.
Something about the landscape feels wrong, like little tiny cracks are appearing in it, cracks that are too small to see, but are there nonetheless.
And there are other things here. Things that almost certainly weren't here before...
Dreamless!
